Warnings
  • Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/right: unknown concept "BoxModel"
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/right

Function FProperty right()
Description right defines right horizontal alignment. It sets the horizontal anchor at 100% of the width of the current figure. right() is equivalent to hanchor(1.0).

Also see BoxModel, hanchor.
